short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See the current YouTube video time relative to a user-defined starting point — perfect for timing sections within videos!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See the current YouTube video time relative to a user-defined starting point — perfect for timing sections within videos! Seek to the time you want to mark as the beginning, press "B", then the overlay will show you the current video time relative to that point. You can even copy the current relative time to your clipboard with a single click.
